title: Create Workspace Structure
description: Complete the monorepo setup and verify all packages are properly configured.
instructions: Create the complete directory structure for all three packages and verify that `bun workspaces list` shows all packages correctly configured.

testCases.description: All three packages listed in workspaces
Each package has name field with @app scope

hints.text: The root package.json needs a workspaces array listing all three package directories
Each package should have a unique name field like @app/api, @app/web, @app/shared
All packages should have "type": "module" for ES modules support

commonMistakes.mistake: Forgetting workspaces array in root package.json
commonMistakes.consequence: Packages are isolated, can't use shared imports
commonMistakes.correction: Add workspaces array pointing to all package directories

commonMistakes.mistake: Using different module types (CommonJS vs ESM)
